SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_ID, '' AS CMPLX_GRP, COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME COMPLEX_M.ADDR, -- 일반 주소 COMPLEX_M.ADDR_DTL, -- 상세 주소 COMPLEX_M.ADDR1, COMPLEX_M.ADDR2, COMPLEX_M_EXT.CL_MAP_SRC, -- CommonLife's Map Src/Url COMPLEX_M_EXT.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC, -- CommonLife's LOGO Image Source (SELECT CMPLX_GRP_TYPE FROM CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_M AS CGP LEFT JOIN CMPLX_GRP_M AS CG ON CGP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = CG.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID WHERE CG.CMPLX_ID = COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_ID ) FROM COMPLEX_M LEFT JOIN -- TODO: 확장테이블인 COMPLEX_M_EXT의 레코드가 없기 때문에 임시로 LEFT JOIN 함 COMPLEX_M_EXT JOIN ON COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_ID = COMPLEX_M_EXT.CMPLX_ID WHERE COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102'
) AS A ORDER BY CMPLX_NM ASC ;

SELECT A.CMPLX_ID AS CMPLX_ID, A.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, A.ADDR AS ADDR, B.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE AS CMPLX_GRP, B.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID AS CMPLX_GRP_ID FROM ( SELECT CMPLX.CMPLX_ID AS CMPLX_ID, CMPLX.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX.ADDR -- 일반 주소 FROM COMPLEX_M AS CMPLX LEFT JOIN -- TODO: 확장테이블인 COMPLEX_M_EXT의 레코드가 없기 때문에 임시로 LEFT JOIN 함 COMPLEX_M_EXT AS CMPLX_EXT ON CMPLX.CMPLX_ID = CMPLX_EXT.CMPLX_ID WHERE CMPLX.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102' ) AS A JOIN ( SELECT CMPLX_ID, CMPLX_GRP_TYPE, GRP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID FROM COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M AS GRP_TYPE LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_M AS GRP ON GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = GRP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID ) AS B ON A.CMPLX_ID = B.CMPLX_ID ORDER BY CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID DESC, CMPLX_NM ASC ;

SELECT A.CMPLX_ID AS CMPLX_ID, A.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, A.CMPLX_S_NM AS CMPLX_S_NM, B.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE AS CMPLX_GRP, B.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID AS CMPLX_GRP_ID, A.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC AS CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC, A.CL_MAP_SRC AS CL_MAP_SRC, A.CMPLX_CD AS CMPLX_CD, A.LATI_POS AS LATI_POS, A.LONG_POS AS LONG_POS, A.UNIT_CNT AS UNIT_CNT, A.ADDR AS ADDR, A.ADDR_DTL AS ADDR_DTL, A.ADDR1 AS ADDR1, A.ADDR2 AS ADDR2, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CMPLX_GRP, CMPLX_NM ASC) AS RNUM, COUNT(1) OVER() AS TOT FROM ( SELECT CMPLX.CMPLX_ID AS CMPLX_ID, CMPLX.CMPLX_CD AS CMPLX_CD, CMPLX.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX.CMPLX_S_NM AS CMPLX_S_NM, CMPLX.LATI_POS AS LATI_POS, CMPLX.LONG_POS AS LONG_POS, CMPLX.UNIT_CNT AS UNIT_CNT, CMPLX.ADDR AS ADDR, -- 일반 주소 CMPLX.ADDR_DTL, CMPLX.ADDR1, CMPLX.ADDR2, CMPLX.LOC1_NM, CMPLX.LOC2_NM, CMPLX.POST_NO, CMPLX.IMG_SRC, CMPLX.MAP_SRC, CMPLX.LOGO_IMG_SRC, CMPLX.ADMIN_ID AS IOK_ADMIN_ID, CMPLX.REG_ID AS IOK_REG_ID, CMPLX.REG_DT AS IOK_REG_DT, CMPLX.CHG_ID AS IOK_CHG_ID, CMPLX.CHG_DT AS IOK_CHG_DT, CMPLX_EXT.CL_MAP_SRC AS CL_MAP_SRC, CMPLX_EXT.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC AS CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC, CMPLX_EXT.FEED_WRITE_ALLOW_YN AS FEED_WRITE_ALLOW_YN, CMPLX_EXT.REG_DT AS REG_DT, CMPLX_EXT.REG_ADMIN_IDX AS REG_ADMIN_IDX, CMPLX_EXT.UPD_DT AS UPD_DT, CMPLX_EXT.UPD_ADMIN_IDX AS UPD_ADMIN_IDX FROM COMPLEX_M AS CMPLX LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_M_EXT AS CMPLX_EXT ON CMPLX.CMPLX_ID = CMPLX_EXT.CMPLX_ID WHERE CMPLX.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102' ) AS A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CMPLX_ID, CMPLX_GRP_TYPE, GRP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID FROM COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M AS GRP_TYPE LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_M AS GRP ON GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = GRP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID ) AS B ON A.CMPLX_ID = B.CMPLX_ID ORDER BY RNUM ;
SELECT CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID, CMPLX_GRP_TYPE, CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_DESC FROM COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M;
mapper.update: INSERT INTO `COMPLEX_GRP_M` ( CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID, CMPLX_ID ) VALUES ( ${cmplxGrpId}, ${cmplxId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = ${cmplxGrpId}, UPD_DTTM=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
mapper.select: SELECT GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE AS CMPLX_GRP_TYPE, CMPLX.CMPLX_ID AS CMPLX_ID, CMPLX.CMPLX_CD AS CMPLX_CD, CMPLX.CMPLX_NM AS CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX.CMPLX_S_NM AS CMPLX_S_NM, CMPLX.LATI_POS AS LATI_POS, CMPLX.LONG_POS AS LONG_POS, CMPLX.UNIT_CNT AS UNIT_CNT, CMPLX.ADDR AS ADDR, -- 일반 주소 CMPLX.ADDR_DTL, CMPLX.ADDR1, CMPLX.ADDR2, CMPLX.LOC1_NM, CMPLX.LOC2_NM, CMPLX.POST_NO, CMPLX.IMG_SRC, CMPLX.MAP_SRC, CMPLX.LOGO_IMG_SRC, CMPLX.ADMIN_ID AS IOK_ADMIN_ID, CMPLX.REG_ID AS IOK_REG_ID, CMPLX.REG_DT AS IOK_REG_DT, CMPLX.CHG_ID AS IOK_CHG_ID, CMPLX.CHG_DT AS IOK_CHG_DT, CMPLX_EXT.CL_MAP_SRC AS CL_MAP_SRC, CMPLX_EXT.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC AS CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC, CMPLX_EXT.FEED_WRITE_ALLOW_YN AS FEED_WRITE_ALLOW_YN, CMPLX_EXT.REG_DT AS REG_DT, (SELECT ADMIN_ID FROM CL_ADMIN_INFO WHERE ADMIN_IDX = CMPLX_EXT.REG_ADMIN_IDX) AS REG_ADMIN_ID, CMPLX_EXT.UPD_DT AS UPD_DT, (SELECT ADMIN_ID FROM CL_ADMIN_INFO WHERE ADMIN_IDX = CMPLX_EXT.UPD_ADMIN_IDX ) AS UPD_ADMIN_ID FROM (COMPLEX_M AS CMPLX LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_M_EXT AS CMPLX_EXT ON CMPLX.CMPLX_ID = CMPLX_EXT.CMPLX_ID) JOIN (COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M AS GRP_TYPE LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_M AS GRP ON GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = GRP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID) ON CMPLX.CMPLX_ID = GRP.CMPLX_ID WHERE CMPLX.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102' AND CMPLX.CMPLX_ID = #{cmplxId} ;
